channel.title: Savetime problem
channel.description: yeah on my Config.java save timer it's [code] public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 60; [/code] when i change it to 120 this still saves every 1 mins.. i want 2 mins.. for lower lags. because every time when this saves makes litle lagg on server.. so i want to 2 mins.

item.title: Savetime problem
item.dc:creator: @No_Life2 No Life
item.description:
@No_Life2 wrote:

This is probably a 317 Project Insanity source – am I right?

Anyway, that constant doesn’t do anything, in fact, a fourth of those constants in Config.java don’t affect the server at all – they were just unfinished ideas.

To stop your server from lagging, I suggest you look into java memory leaking. Almost every PI source has that problem, usually with an array called: byte[].

Here is a leeched image from r-s:

24c79cm.png898×586

That is probably your problem. (it’s the Server class in case you can’t tell).

Read full topic

item.title: Savetime problem
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Why wouldn’t it lagg on 2 minutes if it does on 1 minute?

Read full topic

yeah on my Config.java save timer it’s

public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 60;

when i change it to 120 this still saves every 1 mins… i want 2 mins… for lower lags. because every time when this saves makes litle lagg on server… so i want to 2 mins.
